document_data.name: Barroch
document_data.mainbody:
'''Barroch''' was said to be the first great bandit lord of the [[Inner Sea]] lands. He made his lair at [[Barroch's Hold]], a fabled citadel in the [[Glacier of the White Worm]].

In the [[1356 DR|Year of the Worm, 1356 DR]], a band of adventurers rediscovered Barroch's Hold in the [[Glacier of the White Worm]]. However, they soon ran into a number of strange creatures, and were separated or killed.
